item.splinecart.track_ties.desc: Use Track Tools to customize when placed
item.splinecart.track.desc: Links two Track Marker blocks together
item.splinecart.heading_tool.desc: Changes the heading (horizontal orientation) of the Track Marker.
item.splinecart.heading_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click for more precise control.
item.splinecart.pitching_tool.desc: Changes the Pitching (vertical orientation) of the Track Marker.
item.splinecart.pitching_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click for more precise control.
item.splinecart.banking_tool.desc: Changes the banking of the Track Marker.
item.splinecart.banking_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click for more precise control.
item.splinecart.relative_orientation_too: Changes the heading relative to the pitching of the Track Marker.
item.splinecart.track_style_tool.desc: Changes the look of the Track following this Track Marker.
item.splinecart.track_style_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click to apply to ALL following Track Pieces.
item.splinecart.track_type_tool.desc: Changes the type (normal, chainlift, etc) of the Track following this Track Marker.
item.splinecart.track_type_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click to apply to ALL following Track Pieces.
item.splinecart.track_power_tool.desc: Changes the Power (i. e. speed of chainlift) of the Track following this Track Marker.
item.splinecart.track_power_tool.desc1: Right / Left click to lower / higher value. Shift click to apply to ALL following Track Pieces.
item.splinecart.tools.error_no_marker: Track Tool items can only be used on Track Markers.
item.splinecart.coaster_cart.error_no_ma: Coaster Cart items can only be used on Track Markers
item.splinecart.track.clear_hint: Cancel first selection by using on a non-track block
splinecart.config.splinecart_client.rota: Recommended to be set to 'false' for users prone to motion sickness. When set to 'false', your player camera orientation will remain level while riding a non-level Splinecart track. Non-level tracks are best experienced in third person when 'rotate_camera' is set to 'false'.
splinecart.config.splinecart_client.trac: Higher values decrease performance and increase visual quality. Determines how many segments tracks will be cut into when rendering, with fewer segments making tracks appear jagged. Does not affect minecart movement along tracks.
When the origin track tie block is this many chunks away from you, its track will stop rendering.
